title: The Many-Colored Land
description: When a one-way time tunnel to Earth's distant past, specifically six million B.C., was discovered by folks on the Galactic Milieu, every misfit for light-years around hurried to pass through it. Each sought his own brand of happiness. But none could have guessed what awaited them. Not even in a million years....THE SAGA OF PLIOCENE EXILEVolume MANY-COLORED LANDVolume GOLDEN TORCVolume NONBORN KINGVolume ADVERSARY. . . and don't miss A PLIOCENE COMPANION
author: Julian  May
